alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 1:08AM PDT until April 13 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most likely period for accumulating snow appears to be between midnight tonight and 5 AM Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
